column1: eunice juanita gibson| eunice juanita gibson age 86 of ider died monday
column2: june 22 at de. kalb regional medical center. graveside services are wednesday at 9:00 am ct at beulah chapel cemetery with bro. billy rankin officiating. family will receive friends from 3 to 8 pm tuesday at corner stone. survivors include daughters
column14: gracie baker and joyce plank. ms. gibson was preceded in death by her parents
column17: tina smith. she was a member of philadelphia baptist church.
